attributes.action: Lets make marijuana legal throughout the UK. It's time.
attributes.additional_details: In Washington and Colorado, profits have been astonishing which leads me to belief it is something the UK could tap into. It is also much less of a health risk than alcohol, tobacco, fast food, with not a single fatality ever attributed to the plant.
attributes.background: Given the many medical benefits, its potential in sales and the fact that the demand for marijuana is higher than ever, this could be worth addressing finally.
